title: enda vELaiyum kanda vELai
sahitya:
enda vELaiyum kanda vELai nI cintanai seidiruppAi nenjamE


anupallavi

  inda vAzhvil nI inbam aDaiyavE ellaiyaTra tuyaram enrAgavE


caraNam    kaNNirukkum pozhudE kaNDu koNDADu kAlirukkum pozhudE kOvilai nADu
vAi irukkum pozhudE vaLLalaip-pADu ninavirukkum pozhudE nal vazhiyait-tEDu
